item.title: Who Needs pandoc When You Have Sphinx?
item.description: This was a talk I gave at FOSDEM 2019. In this talk, subtitled “An exploration of the parsers and builders of the Sphinx documentation tool”, I explored some of the less well known aspects of both Sphinx and docutils.

item.title: A Lion, A Head, and A Dash of YAML
item.description: This talk, delivered at FOSDEM 2018, provided a quick dive into the somewhat complicated world of Sphinx extensions. Sphinx is an incredibly powerful tool but, surprisingly for a documentation, suffers from poor quality documentation.
